email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

We are pleased to offer the vessel SEA HORIZON (DWT: 150,000, LOA: 300m) for your 10,000MT steel coils shipment from Rotterdam to Shanghai on CIF terms. The starting freight quote is USD 45 per MT. Laycan is 15-20 October. Demurrage is USD 15,000 per day.

Kind regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the offer. USD 45 per MT seems high compared to the current market. Can you revise the rate? Also, can you confirm the loading window?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I can offer USD 42 per MT. The loading window is 72 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

USD 42 is better. Can we push it to USD 40 per MT? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 16-21 October?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

USD 40 per MT is possible. Laycan adjusted to 16-21 October. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: SEA HORIZON
- Cargo: 10,000MT Steel Coils
- Load Port: Rotterdam
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Laycan: 16-21 October
- Freight: USD 40 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
